Summary: glowing orange ball flew overhead ay a high rate of speed.
divs: Sighting Detailsoutside of a friend's apartment shouting happy new year . Saw it come up from the horizon,and yelled for everyone to come out of the house to look at this thing there were about 7 people outside who watched it go from 1 side of the sky to the other is a very fast speed .we were watching some fireworks and we noticed that the orange fireball was not behaving like a firework ,being it traveled across the sky horizontally.as far as feelings I would say we were all excited and mystified of what it was .after about 30 or 40 seconds of watching it it disappeared over the apartment building at the other side of the courtyard .
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in bensalem
There were no other sightings in bensalem on or around January 1st 2012
